content.raw:
We made a new release of sdformat4 in order to access a new feature that hadn't been released yet in sdformat5. Due to a quirk of the debian metadata, the `libsdformat4-dev` installs the `sdformat-sdf` version 5.2 package, which didn't have that new feature. So I released `sdformat-sdf` version 5.3 with the feature, but the docker cache didn't notice the new package so the test continues to fail:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/349/testReport/junit/(root)/PhysicsEngines_AttachLightTest/LinkLight_0/

I'm going to try a custom branch of release-tools to invalidate the cache.
